item.title: MAGA is fighting a ‘civil war’ over H-1B visas. Here’s what they are.
item.description: Right-wing figures are fighting over H-1B visas that allow highly qualified workers to join the American workforce. Here’s what the permits do.

item.title: Carter to lie in state at Capitol, with state funeral to follow on Jan. 9

item.title: Jimmy Carter’s Jan. 9 funeral plans, full schedule in D.C. and Georgia
item.description: The late president will lie in state at the U.S. Capitol, and President Joe Biden ordered much of the federal government to close Jan. 9.

item.title: Trump endorses Mike Johnson ahead of perilous House speaker vote
item.description: House Republicans have said for weeks that Donald Trump would have the final say on whether Johnson keeps the gavel or is replaced.

item.title: A woman convicted of murder became the Carters’ beloved White House nanny
item.description: Mary Prince went from a Georgia prisoner to Amy Carter’s White House caretaker. It’s a story difficult to imagine in any modern presidency but Jimmy C...
